0.title: About
0.content: Welcome to Richard Tweed’s thoughts on Cloud Native Software, Kubernetes, Production and whatever else he’s been tinkering with. | GitHub | Linkedin | Email | .

1.title: Archive
1.content: This year's posts . | 16 Nov - Reverse Engineering Github Copilot APIs | 23 Sep - Migrate cloudformation to opentofu with LLMs | 22 Sep - Failing to record audio with a Tildagon ESP32 | 21 Aug - Authenticating to AWS from GitHub actions | 11 Jun - Recording what you see on macOS - no external dependencies | 05 May - Making a self hosted link summariser | 02 May - Backing up Slack-mojis | 21 Apr - The challenges of using libraries | 20 Apr - Using your own hardware for llms | 22 Mar - Using a video as a Google Meet background | 07 Mar - Making a custom GPT with chatgpt for cloudquery data | 25 Feb - Finding secrets on GitLab | . 2023 . | 01 Nov - Misusing kubeconfigs | 01 Nov - Pass through JSON logs with vector or filebeat | 26 Jun - Bulk deleting tickets in Jira | 09 Apr - Getting started with LLMs locally | . 2022 . | 13 Dec - VPN over VPN on OpenWrt | 21 Jul - Why LIST is a scary permission on Kubernetes | 11 Jan - Attempt 2 - Managing Google Groups via the API, aka what they don't want you to do! | . 2021 . | 08 Dec - Running a Kubernetes native x86_64 application on Raspberry Pis, and why you shouldn't! | 11 Aug - How Slack and Discord prevent you scanning Infrastructure with link previews | 11 Aug - Managing Google Groups via the API, aka what they don't want you to do! | 05 Aug - Slack-mojis, and why documenting API limitations helps! | 03 Aug - Welcome to Tales From Prod! | .

3.title: Useful Resouces
3.content: This page contains various resources I’ve found useful, one way or another .

4.title: Kubernetes
4.content: . | https://brennerm.github.io/posts/kubernetes-overview-diagrams.html . | Buzzword bingo for Kubernetes, and nicely shows how they are linked | . | . Kubernetes Networking . | Networking deep dive video . | Delves into the complexity of Kubernetes networking | . | .

5.title: Security
5.content: . | https://cloudseclist.com/ . | Run by Marco Lancini, great resource for cloud security articles | . | NSA guide to hardening Kubernetes . | Unexpected resource, but seems a reasonable baseline. | . | .
